ai-patthana23.38:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.38:0.3_0: doing so, they cling to the profitable,
ai-patthana23.38:1.1_0: internally and externally, based on the teaching,
ai-patthana23.38:2.1_0: Not by reciting a teaching with the object, no cause or condition.
